languages.text: "Так приелась эта банальность насилия. Я жажду утонченности".
"This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."
languages.original_text: "Так приелась эта банальность насилия. Я жажду утонченности".

traits.locale_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."
"This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."
"This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."
"This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."
"This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."
"This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

languages.text: « Cette violence banale ne m'apporte rien. J'ai soif de subtilité. »
languages.original_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

traits.locale_text: « Cette violence banale ne m'apporte rien. J'ai soif de subtilité. »

languages.text: “这样的折磨实在是太平庸了，我渴望美妙的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

traits.locale_text: “这样的折磨实在是太平庸了，我渴望美妙的痛苦。”

languages.text: 「こんな普通の暴力じゃ退屈だ。もっと繊細さが欲しいところだな」
languages.original_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

traits.locale_text: 「こんな普通の暴力じゃ退屈だ。もっと繊細さが欲しいところだな」

languages.text: "Diese Gewalt ist mir zu banal. Ich sehne mich nach mehr Subtilität."
languages.original_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Gewalt ist mir zu banal. Ich sehne mich nach mehr Subtilität."

languages.text: «La banalidad de esta violencia me aburre. Ansío mayor sutileza».
languages.original_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

traits.locale_text: «La banalidad de esta violencia me aburre. Ansío mayor sutileza».

languages.text: "Şiddetin bayağılığı, bir noktada sıradanlaşıyor. Ruhumsa inceliğe aç."
languages.original_text: "This banality of violence is dull. I crave subtlety."

traits.locale_text: "Şiddetin banalliği, bir noktada sıradanlaşıyor. Ruhumsa inceliğe aç."
